thread.section_title: Kenya Visa Online Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kenya Visa Online | kenyavisaonline.com
thread.title: Dr Duncan Elmslie Berry
thread.title_full: Kenya Visa Online reviewed by Dr Duncan Elmslie Berry

author: Dr Duncan Elmslie Berry
title: Dr Duncan Elmslie Berry
text: I have visited Kenya approximately 25 times over the past 6 years and it is irksome and excessively time consuming for me to have list all of my entries and departures. Something needs to be done about this. This information was not as far I am aware required under the old paper visa system.
